actions.text: On agreeing to the Franks (NJ) amendment (A037) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment clarifies that the ocean dumping provisions apply only to the ocean dumping of dredged material, and not to the dumping of sewage sludge or other materials.
purpose: An amendment (printed as amendment No. 18 in the Congressional Record of May 9) to clarify that the ocean-dumping provisions of the bill are to apply only to the dumping of material dredged by the Army Corps of Engineers, not the dumping of sewage sludge or other materials.
